Verses: 1 thoobankaattugiradharku Oru Thooba Beedaththaiyum Seeththim Maraththinaal Undaakkuvaayaaga.
2 adhu Oru Muzha Neelamum Oru Muzha Agalamumaana Sadhuramum, Irandu Muzha Uyaramumaai Irukkavendum, Adhin Kombugal Adhanode Egamumaayirukka Vendum.
3 adhin Merpuraththaiyum Sutruppuraththaiyum Adhin Kombugalaiyum Pasumpondhakattaal Moodi, Sutrilum Adharkup Pondhiranaiyai Undupanni,
4 andhath Thiranaiyinkeezhe Adhin Irandu Pakkangalilum Adhaich Sumakkum Thandugalin Idangalaagiya Adhin Irandu Pakkaththu Irandu Moolaigalilum Irandu Pon Valaiyangalai Undaakkuvaayaaga.
5 andhath Thandugalaiyum Seeththim Maraththaal Panni, Avaigalaiyum Pondhakattaal Moodakkadavaai.
6 saatchippettikku Munnirukkum Thiraichcheelaikkum, Naan Unnaich Sandhikkum Idamaagiya Saatchi Sannidhiyinmelulla Kirubaasanaththukkum Munbaaga Adhai Vaikkakkadavaai.
7 aaron Kaalaidhorum Adhinmel Sugandha Thoobankaattavendum; Maalaiyil Vilakketrumbodhum Adhinmel Thoobankaattakkadavan; Vilakkugalai Vilakkumbodhum Adhinmel Thoobankaattavendum.
8 ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Kaattavendiya Niththiya Thoobam Idhuve.
9 adhinmel Anniya Thoobaththaiyaagilum, Thaganabaliyaiyaagilum, Bojanabaliyaiyaagilum Padaikkavendaam; Adhin Mel Paanabaliyai Ootravum Vendaam.

10 varushaththil Orumurai Aaron Paavanivaaranabaliyin Raththaththinaal Adhin Kombugalinmel Piraayachchiththampannuvaanaaga; Ungal Thalaimurai Dhorum Varushaththil Orumurai Adhin Mel Piraayachchiththampannuvaanaaga; Adhu Karththarukku Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu Endraar.
11 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

12 nee Isravel Puththirarai Avargal Lakkaththinbadi Kanakkuppaarkkum Poruttu, Avargalai Ennumbodhu, Avargalukkulle Oru Vaadhai Undaagaadhabadikku, Avargalil Ovvoruvanum Ennappadum Samayaththil Thandhan Aaththumaavukkaagak Karththarukku Meetkum Porulaik Kodukkakkadavan.

13 ennappadukiravargalin Thogaiyile Serugira Ovvoruvanum Parisuththa Sthalaththuch Sekkal Kanakkinbadi Araisekkal Kodukkavendum; Oru Sekkalukku Iruvadhu Geraa; Karththarukkuch Seluththappaduvadhu Araisekkal.
14 ennappadugiravargalin Thogaiyile Serugira Iruvadhu Vayadhu Mudharkondu Adharku Merpatta Ovvoruvanum Adhaik Karththarukkuch Seluththavendum.

15 ungal Aaththumaakkalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Pannumbadi Neengal Karththarukkuk Kaanikkai Seluththumbodhu, Aisuvariyavaan Araisekkalukku Adhigamaaik Kodukkavum Vendaam, Thariththiran Adharkuk Kuraivaagak Kodukkavum Vendaam.

16 andhap Paavanivirththi Panaththai Nee Isravel Puththirar Kaiyil Vaangi, Adhai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Thiruppanikkuk Koduppaayaaga; Adhu Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ungal Aaththumaakkalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumporuttu, Isravel Puththirarukku Gnaapakakkuriyaayirukkum Endraar.
17 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

18 kazhuvugiradharku Vengalaththaal Oru Thottiyaiyum, Vengalaththaal Adhin Paadhaththaiyum Undaakki, Adhai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirkum Balibeedaththirkum Naduve Vaiththu, Adhile Thanneer Vaarppaayaaga.
19 adhanidaththil Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Thangal Kaigalaiyum Thangal Kaalgalaiyum Kazhuvakkadavargal.

20 avargal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirkul Piravesikkumbodhum, Karththarukkuth Thaganaththaik Koluththavum Balibeedaththinidaththil Aaraadhanaiseyyavum Serumbodhum, Avargal Saagaadhabadikkuth Thanneerinaal Thangalaik Kazhuvakkadavargal.
21 avargal Saagaadhabadikkuth Thangal Kaigalaiyum Thangal Kaalgalaiyum Kazhuvakkadavargal; Idhu Thalaimuraidhorum Avanukkum Avan Sandhadhiyaarukkum Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkum Endraar.
22 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

23 menmaiyaana Sugandhavarkkangalaagiya Suththamaana Vellaippolaththil Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkalinbadi Ainnooru Sekkal Idaiyaiyum, Sugandha Karuvaappattaiyile Adhil Paadhiyaagiya Irunootru Aimpadhu Sekkal Idaiyaiyum, Sugandha Vasampil Irunootru Aimpadhu Sekkal Idaiyaiyum,
24 ilavangappattaiyil Ainnooru Sekkal Idaiyaiyum, Oliva Enneyil Oru Kudam Enneyaiyum Eduththu,
25 adhanaal, Parimala Thailakkaaran Seyvadhupola, Koottappatta Parimalathailamaagiya Suththamaana Abishega Thailaththai Undupannuvaayaaga; Adhu Parisuththa Abishega Thailamaayirukkakkadavadhu.
26 adhinaale Aasarippuk Koodaaraththaiyum, Saatchippettiyaiyum,
27 mejaiyaiyum, Adhin Panimuttugal Ellaavatraiyum, Kuththuvilakkaiyum, Adhin Karuvigalaiyum, Thoobabeedaththaiyum,
28 thagana Balibeedaththaiyum, Adhin Panimuttukal Ellaavatraiyum, Thottiyaiyum, Adhin Paadhaththaiyum Abishegam Panni,
29 avaigal Magaa Parisuththamaayirukkumbadikku, Avaigalaip Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga; Avaigalaith Thodugiradhellaam Parisuththamaayirukkum.
30 aaronum Avan Kumaararum Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadikku, Nee Avargalai Abishegampanni, Avargalaip Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga.
31 isravel Puththirarode Nee Pesich Sollavendiyadhaavadhu: Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Idhu Enakkuriya Parisuththa Abishega Thailamaayirukkavendum.

32 idhu Manidharudaiya Sareeraththinmel Vaarkkappadalaagaadhu; Idhu Seyyappatta Muraiyinbadi Avargal Veroru Thailaththaich Seyyavung Koodaadhu; Idhu Parisuththamaanadhu, Idhu Ungalukkup Parisuththamaayiruppadhaaga.
33 indha Muraiyinbadiye Thailangoottugiravanum, Adhil Eduththu Anniyanmel Vaarkkiravanum, Than Janaththil Iraadhabadikku Aruppundupogakkadavan Endru Sol Endraar.
34 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Suththa Vellaippolamum Kungiliyamum Alpaan Pisinumaagiya Kandhavarkkangalaiyum Suththamaana Saampiraaniyaiyum Nee Samaniraiyaaga Eduththu,
35 thailakkaaran Seygiradhupola Adharkup Parimalametri, Thuppuravaana Parisuththa Thoobavarkkamaakki,
36 adhil Konjam Eduththup Podiyaaga Idiththu, Naan Unnaich Sandhikkum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththilirukkum Saatchi Sannidhiyil Vaippaayaaga; Adhu Ungalukku Magaa Parisuththamaayirukkakkadavadhu.
37 indhath Thoobavarkkaththai Nee Seyyavendiya Muraiyinbadi Ungalukkaagach Seydhukollalaagaadhu; Idhu Karththarukkendru Unakkup Parisuththamaayiruppadhaaga.
38 idharku Oppaanadhai Mukarukiradharkaagach Seygiravan Than Janaththil Iraadhabadi Aruppundupogakkadavan Endraar.
